data.actual_result: For some reason, the message pops up when you try to attach a file.
data.expected_result: The message shouldn't pop up when you try to attach a file.
data.short_description: (On devices without flash) "Flash off" bubble appears when trying to attach files
data.steps_to_repro: - This bug is only reproducible on devices without flash. If you don't have a device without flash, you can try to set up an android emulator using Bluestacks or similar programs. (I tested with bluestacks first) - Open up discord, and find a server where you can attach files. - Open up the "Add content" menu using the plus button next to the chat. - Try to attach a file using the paper icon. - Now the "Flash off" message comes up, despite you not clicked on the camera icon.
